爬.definition: to crawl; to climb; to get up or sit up

爬升.definition: to rise; to ascend; to climb (airplane etc); to go up (sales figures etc); to gain promotion

爬山.definition: to climb a mountain; to mountaineer; hiking; mountaineering

爬山涉水.definition: to climb mountains and wade rivers (idiom); fig. to make a long and difficult journey

爬山虎.definition: Boston ivy or Japanese creeper (Parthenocissus tricuspidata)

爬格子.definition: (oral) to write (esp. for a living); to spell out laboriously on squared paper

爬梳.definition: to comb through (historical documents etc); to unravel

爬灰.definition: incest between father-in-law and daughter-in-law; also written 扒灰

爬牆.definition: to climb a wall; (fig.) to be unfaithful

爬竿.definition: pole-climbing (as gymnastics or circus act); climbing pole

爬蟲類.definition: reptiles; also written 爬行類|爬行类

爬行類.definition: reptiles; also written 爬行動物|爬行动物
